name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Todo List: Listing Todo's made easy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Everyone often have their day to day tasks according to their priority.

This extension will help you to organize the tasks in better way. And as your task gets completed you can remove it from the list, simply by clicking on delete button or all tasks are completed just press button delete all.

I hope you'll like it :)
